name: Return Filter Element
description:
High-Efficiency Hydraulic Filtration

Genuine HYDAC return filter element designed for optimal performance and longevity in demanding hydraulic systems. Ensures maximum cleanliness and protects sensitive components from contamination.

  • High dirt-holding capacity
  • Low pressure drop
  • Compatible with a wide range of hydraulic fluids

name: Engine Air Filter
description:
Perkins Genuine Air Filter

Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) engine air filter for Perkins 1100 Series diesel engines. Designed to meet strict specifications to provide the best protection for your generator engine.

name: Hydraulic Main Pump Assembly
description:
Genuine CAT Hydraulic Pump

A complete main hydraulic pump assembly for Caterpillar 320C and 320D excavators. Remanufactured to meet or exceed OEM specifications for pressure, flow, and durability. A critical component for restoring your heavy equipment's performance.

name: SIMATIC S7-1200 CPU 1214C
description:
Compact Automation Controller

The Siemens SIMATIC S7-1200 controller is ideal for automation tasks in the low to medium performance range. It is the controller of choice for elevator control systems, conveyor belts, and other industrial machinery requiring compact and reliable logic control.
